    • Constructor Detail

      • DtnProtocol

        public DtnProtocol(java.lang.String identifier,
                   java.lang.String payloadFrameSize,
                   java.lang.String overheadFrameSize,
                   java.lang.String protocolClass)
        Constructor of a DtnProtocol object
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier of the object
        payloadFrameSize - The frame size of the protocol (in bytes)
        overheadFrameSize - The overhead size of the protocol (in bytes)
        protocolClass - The protocol class (see ION-DTN documentation for details, most of the time 8)

      • DtnProtocol

        public DtnProtocol(android.os.Parcel in)
        Constructor for reconstructing elements from parcels
        Parameters:
        in - The parcel containing the object in a "flat" form

        Returns the overhead frame size
        Returns:
        the overhead frame size in bytes as integer

      • getProtocolClass

        public int getProtocolClass()
        Returns the protocol class
        Returns:
        the protocol class as integer (see ION-DTN documentation for details on the protocol classes)

        public boolean equals(DtnProtocol obj)
        Compares two DtnProtocol objects and checks for logical equality
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if logically equal, false otherwise
